Name: Indigenous Artist Market Collective
Address: Old Strathcona Farmers Market (10310 83 Ave NW) and Fort Edmonton Park (7000 143 St NW, Edmonton)
Description: I.A.M is an Indigenous arts collective of more than 170+ First Nations, Metis and Inuit artists. See website for info re location+times!

Name: Gravity Pope
Address: 10442 Whyte Ave NW, Edmonton, AB T6E 2A1
Description: This Whyte Ave legend is Edmonton’s most beloved shoe store. You can also drop by their brand new clothing boutique only one block down from Gravity Pope Shoes.

Name: Old Strathcona Farmers’ Market
Description: A year-round indoor market held every Saturday, featuring over 130 vendors selling local produce, crafts, and prepared foods.

Name: Old Strathcona & Whyte Avenue
Description: A historic shopping and entertainment district with unique boutiques, restaurants, theatres, and pubs.

Name: Downtown Farmer's Market
Description: A year-round market operating on Saturdays and Sundays, offering fresh food, local products, and a lively atmosphere.

Name: 124th Street
Description: Home to some of the city’s finest local independent restaurants, coffee shops, art galleries and boutiques.

Name: West Edmonton Mall
Description: North America's largest shopping mall, featuring over 800 stores, an indoor waterpark, amusement park, and more.
